prompts: Create an adorable Psychic-type Pokemon that bounces on a spring-like tail and has a cute smile.
I want a small, round Pokemon with a pink head and a spiraled body for my Pokedex.
Generate a whimsical creature that has a gray body and a pink accent on its head, resembling a playful ball.
Make a Pokemon design that features a joyful character with a bouncing motion and psychic powers.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to hop around and has a unique spring-like feature.
Design a Pokemon with a round shape, a cute face, and a playful personality for a fun game.
Show me a Pokemon with a plush appearance and a light, cheerful vibe that captivates trainers.
